The JDBCAppender writes messages into a database via JDBC.

JDBCColumnHandler - interface org.apache.log4j.jdbcplus.JDBCColumnHandler.
This interface has to be implemented to provide DYNAMIC-columns with content and its used in class JDBCLogger.
JDBCColumnStorage - class org.apache.log4j.jdbcplus.JDBCColumnStorage.
Storage of the columns
JDBCColumnStorage(String, int, Object, String, int) - Constructor for class org.apache.log4j.jdbcplus.JDBCColumnStorage
Constructor for the JDBCColumnStorage object
JDBCConnectionHandler - interface org.apache.log4j.jdbcplus.JDBCConnectionHandler.
This interface has to be implemented for your own database-connection-handling and its used in class JDBCLogger.
JDBCDefaultConnectionHandler - class org.apache.log4j.jdbcplus.JDBCDefaultConnectionHandler.
This is a default JDBCConnectionHandler used by JDBCAppender
JDBCDefaultConnectionHandler(String, String, String) - Constructor for class org.apache.log4j.jdbcplus.JDBCDefaultConnectionHandler
 
JDBCIDHandler - interface org.apache.log4j.jdbcplus.JDBCIDHandler.
This interface has to be implemented to provide ID-columns with unique IDs and its used in class JDBCLogger.
JDBCLogColumn - class org.apache.log4j.jdbcplus.JDBCLogColumn.
This class encapsulate all by class JDBCLogger needed data around a column
JDBCLogColumn() - Constructor for class org.apache.log4j.jdbcplus.JDBCLogColumn
 
JDBCLogger - class org.apache.log4j.jdbcplus.JDBCLogger.
This class encapsulate the logic which is necessary to log into a table.
JDBCLogger() - Constructor for class org.apache.log4j.jdbcplus.JDBCLogger
 
JDBCLogType - class org.apache.log4j.jdbcplus.JDBCLogType.
This class contains all constants which are necessary to define a columns log-type.
JDBCLogType() - Constructor for class org.apache.log4j.jdbcplus.JDBCLogType
 
JDBCPoolConnectionHandler - interface org.apache.log4j.jdbcplus.JDBCPoolConnectionHandler.
This interface has to be implemented for your own database-connection-handling and its used in class JDBCLogger.
JDBCSequencer - class org.apache.log4j.jdbcplus.JDBCSequencer.
simple Id handler.
JDBCSequencer() - Constructor for class org.apache.log4j.jdbcplus.JDBCSequencer
 
JDBCSqlHandler - interface org.apache.log4j.jdbcplus.JDBCSqlHandler.
This interface has to be implemented to provide dynamic sql-statements and its used in class JDBCLogger.
